text: Jonathan Spokeyjack (born 13 November 1998) is a Vanuatuan footballer who plays as a midfielder for Vanuatuan club Erakor Golden Star and the Vanuatu national team. ==Club career== Spokeyjack started his career in the national Teouma Academy. In 2016, he moved to Shepherds United. A year later he moved to Ifira Black Bird. In January 2019 he moved to Erakor Golden Star to play in the 2019 OFC Champions League. ==National team== In 2019 Spokeyjack was called up for the Vanuatu national football team. He made his debut on March 18, 2019, in a 3–1 loss against the Solomon Islands. He did not play in the whole of the match as he received a red card in the 84th minute. ==References== Category:Vanuatuan footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Vanuatu international footballers Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:Erakor Golden Star F.C. players
title: Jonathan Spokeyjack
